TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RichTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows Rich Text Box 控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows rich text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與控制項，使用者可以輸入和編輯文字。With the control, the user can enter and edit text. 控制項也提供更進階的格式化功能，比標準控制項。The control also provides more advanced formatting features than the standard control. 文字可以直接指派給控制項，或可以載入從 rtf 格式 (RTF) 或純文字檔。Text can be assigned directly to the control, or can be loaded from a rich text format (RTF) or plain text file. 字元和段落格式，可以指派內控制項的文字。The text within the control can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 控制項提供許多可用來將格式套用到控制項中文字的任何部分的屬性。The control provides a number of properties you can use to apply formatting to any portion of text within the control. 若要變更的文字格式，您必須先選擇。To change the formatting of text, it must first be selected. 字元和段落格式，可以指派只有選取的文字。Only selected text can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 一旦設定對選取的文字區段，會選取所有文字輸入之後變更設定之前，使用相同的設定也格式化選取項目或控制項的文件的其他部分。Once a setting has been made to a selected section of text, all text entered after the selection is also formatted with the same settings until a setting change is made or a different section of the control's document is selected. 屬性可讓您將粗體或斜體的文字。The property enables you to make text bold or italic. 您也可以使用這個屬性來變更文字的字體和大小。You can also use this property to change the size and typeface of the text. 屬性可讓您變更文字的色彩。The property enables you to change the color of the text. 若要建立您可以使用的項目符號清單屬性。To create bulleted lists you can use the property. 您也可以調整設定格式化的段落， ，和屬性。You can also adjust paragraph formatting by setting the , , and properties. 控制項提供開啟和儲存檔案提供功能的方法。The control provides methods that provide functionality for opening and saving files. 方法可讓您將現有的 RTF 或 ASCII 文字檔案載入控制項。The method enables you to load an existing RTF or ASCII text file into the control. 您也可以從已開啟的資料流載入資料。You can also load data from an already opened data stream. 可讓您將檔案儲存至 RTF 或 ASCII 文字。The enables you to save a file to RTF or ASCII text. 類似於方法，您也可以使用方法，將儲存到開啟的資料流。Similar to the method, you can also use the method to save to an open data stream. 控制項也提供功能來尋找文字字串。The control also provides features for finding strings of text. 方法是多載來尋找文字的這兩個字串內控制項的文字以及為特定的字元。The method is overloaded to find both strings of text as well as specific characters within the text of the control. 您也可以初始化儲存在記憶體中資料的控制項。You can also initialize the control to data stored in memory. 例如，您可以初始化屬性設為包含文字顯示，包括 RTF 碼，以決定應如何格式化文字的字串。For example, you can initialize the property to a string that contains the text to display, including the RTF codes that determine how the text should be formatted. 如果控制項內的文字包含連結，例如連結至網站，您可以使用可適當地將連結顯示在控制項中的文字中的屬性。If the text within the control contains links, such as a link to a Web site, you can use the property to display the link appropriately in the control's text. 然後您可以處理事件以執行與連結相關聯的工作。You can then handle the event to perform the tasks associated with the link. 屬性可讓您防止使用者操作的控制項內的文字。The property enables you to protect text within the control from manipulation by the user. 與受保護的文字在控制項中，您可以處理事件，以判斷當使用者嘗試修改受保護的文字，並請警告使用者，受保護的文字，或是使用者提供的標準方式來管理受保護的文字。With protected text in your control, you can handle the event to determine when the user has attempted to modify protected text, and either alert the user that the text is protected or provide the user with a standard way to manipulate the protected text. 已使用的應用程式控制項可以輕鬆地調整以讓使用控制項。Applications that already use controls can easily be adapted to make use of controls. 不過，控制項沒有相同的 64k 字元容量限制控制項。However, the control does not have the same 64K character capacity limit of the control. 通常用來提供操作文字，並顯示類似於文書處理應用程式，例如 Microsoft Word 的功能。The is typically used to provide text manipulation and display features similar to word processing applications such as Microsoft Word. > [!NOTE] > 方法不適用於或事件。The method does not work with the or events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項，可將 RTF 檔載入控制項，然後搜尋第一個執行個體的 word 「 文字 」。The following code example creates a control that loads an RTF file into the control and searches for the first instance of the word "Text." 然後，程式碼變更字型樣式、 字型大小和所選取文字的字型色彩，並將變更儲存回原始的檔案。The code then changes the font style, font size, and font color of the selected text and saves the changes back to the original file. 加入控制項的範例程式碼完成其。The example code finishes by adding the control to its . 這個範例需要在此範例程式碼中建立方法會加入至類別，並從表單的建構函式呼叫。This example requires that the method created in the example code is added to a class and called from the constructor of the form. 這個範例也需要將 RTF 檔建立的根目錄中的 C 磁碟機，包含單字 「 文字 」。The example also requires that an RTF file is created, in the root of the C drive, containing the word "Text." remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行拖放作業使用控制項，其中包含項目並放入控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a control that contains items to drop into a control. 將表單的建構函式屬性`true`若要啟用拖放作業在發生。The constructor of the form sets the property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the . 此範例會使用事件開始拖曳作業藉由呼叫方法。The example uses the event of the to start the drag operation by calling the method. 此範例會使用事件，以判斷項目拖曳至是有效的資料類型。The example uses the event to determine if an item being dragged into the is a valid data type. 事件執行的拖曳的項目到實際的卸除控制項內的目前游標位置。The event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the control at the current cursor location within the . 這個範例需要和事件已連接至範例中定義的事件處理常式。This example requires that the and events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，選取任何部分文字控制項中選取整個字詞。If this property is set to `true`, selecting any part of the text in the control selects the entire word. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立放大文字，會自動選取文字中控制項的文字時文字行首，且控制項的用戶端區域右邊界。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控制項具有較小的寬度，使用下列程式碼會建立所在的那一行顯示每個文字字元。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在 此垂直顯示的位置，文字的任何部分按一下將選取的文字會以垂直方式顯示的事實不論 word 的所有字元。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 這個範例需要您有包含表單的控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. summary.span: 當項目符號樣式套用於文字時，取得或設定用於 控制項中的縮排。

span.span: Gets or sets the indentation used in the control when the bullet style is applied to the text.

value.span: 插入項目符號後面做為縮排的像素數目。

span.span: The number of pixels inserted as the indentation after a bullet.

value.span: 預設值是零。

span.span: The default is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將項目符號樣式套用至一段文字，設定屬性`true`，然後設定文字應該會縮排的像素數目的屬性。To apply the bullet style to a paragraph of text, set the property to `true` and then set the property to the number of pixels that the text should be indented. 在一段必須套用至它與指定的項目符號之後的縮排數量的項目符號樣式。The paragraph will have the bullet style applied to it with the specified amount of indentation after the bullet. 這個屬性只會影響目前的段落內控制項的文字和項目符號項目清單中目前選取的項目符號。This property only affects the current paragraph within the control's text and the currently selected bullet in a list of bulleted items. 若要將不同的縮排層級套用至整個清單的項目符號項目，必須選取項目符號的所有文字內容，才能設定屬性。To apply a different indentation level to an entire list of bulleted items, all the text of the bulleted items must be selected before setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性， ， ，和屬性，以建立分項清單中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`表單上建立。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.BulletIndent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.BulletIndent/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.BulletIndent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.BulletIndent/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.BulletIndent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.BulletIndent/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的縮排小於零。

span.span: The specified indentation was less than zero.

span.span: Determines whether you can paste information from the Clipboard in the specified data format.

span.span: if you can paste data from the Clipboard in the specified data format; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來判斷目前剪貼簿的內容是否以指定的剪貼簿資料格式中，啟用使用者貼上到的資訊之前控制項。You can use this method to determine whether the current contents of the Clipboard are in a specified Clipboard data format before enabling the user to paste the information into the control. 例如，您可以建立事件處理常式貼上命令的事件並使用這個方法來判斷是否貼上應該根據剪貼簿中的資料類型啟用。For example, you could create an event handler for a event of a paste command and use this method to determine whether the paste should be enabled based on the type of data in the Clipboard. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以貼上至點陣圖控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 在開啟之後點陣圖檔案，此範例會使用的點陣圖複製到 Windows 剪貼簿的方法。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最後，此範例將擷取的格式物件，使用方法以驗證格式，可以貼到控制項，然後再使用貼上資料的方法。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, uses the method to verify that the format can be pasted into the control, and then uses the method to paste the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法會搜尋第一個執行個體，從清單中所指定字元的字元`characterSet`參數並傳回字元的位置。This version of the method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character. 例如，您傳遞字元，其中包含字元 'Q' 的陣列。For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'. 如果控制項包含文字"快速 Brown Fox"，方法會傳回四個值。If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the method would return the value of four. 為大寫字母和小寫字元會視為不同的值，在搜尋。An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search. 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的字元是內找不到控制項的內容。If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control. 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋一組控制項中的字元。You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control. 這個版本的方法需要包含控制項中的整個文件會搜尋的字元。This version of the method requires that the entire document contained in the control is searched for the characters. 如果從提供的方法中的字元清單的字元`characterSet`找不到參數，這個方法所傳回的值為控制項中的字元位置的以零為起始索引。If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control. 空格會被視為字元方法所決定的字元位置時。A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會搜尋的內容會傳遞至方法中的字元`text`參數。The following code example searches the contents of a for the characters that are passed to the method in the `text` parameter. 如果內容`text`陣列位於方法會傳回找到; 否則為值的索引，則傳回-1。If the contents of the `text` array are found in the , the method returns the index of the value that is found; otherwise, it returns -1. 這個範例需要這個方法會放置在類別中的包含控制項，名為`richTextBox1`和控制項，名為`button1`，也就是連接到`Click`中定義的事件處理常式此範例中。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a control named `richTextBox1` and a control, named `button1`, that is connected to the `Click` event handler defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法會搜尋第一個執行個體，從清單中所指定字元的字元`characterSet`參數並傳回字元的位置。This version of the method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character. 例如，您傳遞字元，其中包含字元 'Q' 的陣列。For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'. 如果控制項包含文字"快速 Brown Fox"，方法會傳回四個值。If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the method would return the value of four. 為大寫字母和小寫字元會視為不同的值，在搜尋。An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search. 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的字元是內找不到控制項的內容。If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control. 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋一組控制項中的字元。You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control. 如果從提供的方法中的字元清單的字元`characterSet`找不到參數，這個方法所傳回的值是以零為起始的字元位置，在控制項中的索引。If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero based index of the character's position in the control. 空格會被視為字元方法所決定的字元位置時。A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character. 這個版本的方法可讓您搜尋所指定的值從控制項中的文字範圍的設定字元`start`和`end`參數。This version of the method enables you to search for a character set from a range of text in the control by specifying a value for the `start` and `end` parameters. 的值為零`start`參數表示搜尋應該從控制項的文件的開頭開始。A value of zero for the `start` parameter indicates that the search should start from the beginning of the control's document. 值為-1`end`參數表示搜尋應該在控制項中文字的結尾結束。A -1 value for the `end` parameter indicates that the search should end at the end of the text within the control. 您可以使用這個版本的來縮小搜尋範圍，以特定的控制項，以避免搜尋文件不是重要的應用程式需求的區域內的文字範圍的方法。You can use this version of the method to narrow your search to a specific range of text within the control to avoid searching areas of the document that are not important to the needs of your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋中指定的文字`str`參數，並傳回控制項中的字串搜尋的第一個字元的位置。The method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character of the search string within the control. 屬性會傳回負數值，如果要搜尋的文字字串找不到控制項的內容中。If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control. 您可以使用這個方法來建立，可供使用者控制項的搜尋功能。You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control. 您也可以使用這個方法來搜尋的文字取代特定的格式。You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format. 例如，如果使用者控制項中輸入日期，您可以使用方法搜尋文件中的所有日期，並以適當的格式取代之前使用控制項的方法。For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you could use the method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the method of the control. 與此版本方法，您可以指定選項，可讓您展開或縮小搜尋範圍。With this version of the method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search. 您可以指定可讓您以符合大小寫的搜尋文字，或整個文字，而不是部分文字搜尋選項。You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words. 藉由指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中的列舉`options`參數，您可以搜尋文件底部到頂端，而不是預設頂端到底部搜尋方法的文字。By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method. 這個版本的方法也可讓您選取特定的開始位置，控制項的文字內縮小搜尋的文字。This version of the method also enables you to narrow the search for text by selecting a specific starting position within the control's text. 這項功能可讓您避免使用文字，可能已經被搜尋，或在其中指定您要搜尋的文字已知不存在。This feature can enable you to avoid text that might have already been searched or where the specific text you are searching for is known not to exist. 當`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`該值會以指定`options`參數、 值`start`參數表示的位置，因為文件的底部會開始搜尋 時使用這個版本的反向搜尋將會結束的位置方法。When the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` value is specified in the `options` parameter, the value of the `start` parameter indicates the position where the reverse search will end since the search will start at the bottom of the document when using this version of the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法接受`string`參數找不到包含在多行文字方塊內文字的文字為。The methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the . 執行這類搜尋將傳回負一 (-1)。Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會搜尋的整個內容搜尋字串的第一個執行個體傳遞至方法的文字參數。The following code example searches the entire contents of a for the first instance of a search string passed into the text parameter of the method. 搜尋開始位置是由開始參數指定的方法。The search starting location is specified by the start parameter of the method. 如果搜尋字串中找到，方法會傳回找到的文字的第一個字元的索引位置，並反白顯示找到的文字; 否則它會傳回-1 值。If the search string is found in the , the method returns the index location of the first character of the found text and highlights the found text; otherwise, it returns a value of -1. 此範例也會指定選項中搜尋符合指定的搜尋字串的大小寫。The example also specifies options in the search to match the case of the specified search string. 這個範例需要這個方法會放置在類別中的包含名為`richTextBox1`。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a named `richTextBox1`. 您可以使用此範例執行 「 尋找下一個 」 類型的作業。You can use this example to perform a "Find Next" type of operation. 一旦找到搜尋文字的執行個體，您可以變更的值來尋找文字的其他執行個體`start`搜尋位置超過目前的相符項目位置的參數。Once an instance of the search text has been found, you can find other instances of the text by changing the value of the `start` parameter to search at a location beyond the position of the current match. text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method. 這個版本的方法也可讓您選取特定的開始和結束位置的控制項文字內縮小搜尋的文字。This version of the method also enables you to narrow the remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回最接近指定位置的字元索引`pt`參數。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字元索引為起始的索引中的控制項，包括空格的文字。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 您可以使用這個方法，以判斷其中文字中的使用者將滑鼠移過將滑鼠座標傳遞至這個方法。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 這可以是如果您想要執行的工作，使用者將滑鼠指標置於控制項的文字中的字時很有用。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法方法來搜尋特定的字串內控制，並顯示找到的字串所在位置內的字元索引控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method with the method to search for a specific string within a control and display the character index where the found string is located within the control. 範例搜尋控制項的內容中的"brown"這個字，並傳回位於搜尋字串的字元索引位置。The example searches for the word "brown" within the contents of the control and returns the character index position where the search string is found. 這個範例需要您有包含表單的控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，其中包含文字。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1` that contains text. 它也需要確認此範例中的程式碼已連線至事件。It also requires that the code in the example is connected to the event of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您判斷在指定的字元索引為基礎的行號`index`方法的參數。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控制項中文字的第一行會傳回值為零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法傳回的實體的行號索引的字元所在控制項中。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果第一個邏輯程式敘述行中的文字部分控制項換行至下一行，方法會傳回 1，如果第二個實體的行換行字元的指定的索引處的字元。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果設`false`、 行的任何部分換行至下一步，而且方法會傳回 0，表示指定的字元索引。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪一行特定的字元索引位於內。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在呼叫之後方法來搜尋的文字，您可以取得找到的搜尋結果的字元索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以呼叫這個方法所傳回的字元索引與找不到方法，以判斷這行文字。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. 在某些情況下，沒有擲回例外狀況時`index`參數是無效的值。In certain cases, does not throw an exception when the `index` parameter is an invalid value. 例如: For example: - 如果`index`參數是則為-1，傳回 0。If the `index` parameter is or -1, returns 0. - 如果`index`參數是文字長度或，傳回的最後一行文字，不一定是相同的數目為`Lines.Length-1`上的值，取決於屬性。If the `index` parameter is the text length or , returns the number of the last line of text, which is not necessarily the same as `Lines.Length-1`, depending on the value of the property. 在這些情況下，驗證的輸入，然後再呼叫。In these cases, validate the input before calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的字元索引`index`參數超出可用的控制項中包含的行數，會傳回最後一個行號。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 若要執行範例時，將下列程式碼貼中表單，其中包含控制項，名為`RichTextBox1`，名為按鈕`Button1`和名為兩個文字方塊`TextBox1`和`TextBox2`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control named `RichTextBox1`, a button named `Button1` and two text boxes named `TextBox1` and `TextBox2`. 當執行範例時，輸入搜尋字串中的`TextBox2`按一下按鈕，以取得搜尋結果。When the example is running, enter a search string in `TextBox2` and click the button to get search results. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxGetLine#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxGetLine/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxGetLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxGetLine/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxGetLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxGetLine/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您判斷在控制項中特定的字元索引所在位置。This method enables you to determine where in the control a specific character index is located. 您可以使用這個方法針對在控制項中顯示快顯功能表項目或說明資訊 word 等工作。You can use this method for such tasks as displaying shortcut menu items or help information for a word in the control. 例如，如果您想要向使用者顯示選項功能表，當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下控制項中文字時，可以使用此方法判斷才能正確顯示文字的位置控制項。For example, if you wanted to display a menu of options to the user when the user right clicks on a word in the control, you can use this method to determine the position of the word to properly display a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立處理連結已經在控制項中按下此事件的事件處理常式。You can create an event handler for this event to process a link that has been clicked within the control. 使用事件處理常式所提供的資訊，您可以判斷哪一個連結已按下文件中。Using the information provided to the event handler, you can determine which link was clicked in the document. > [!IMPORTANT] > 根據預設，連結會顯示為文字而不可點選。By default, links are displayed as text and are not clickable. 若要使其可點按組屬性`true`。To make them clickable set the property to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含的事件處理常式事件。The following code example contains an event handler for the event. 事件處理常式處理的文件內連結點選控制，並啟動預設瀏覽器的執行個體 (使用方法)，顯示已按下連結的頁面。The event handler processes link clicks within the document of a control and launches an instance of the default browser (using the method), displaying the page for the link that was clicked. 這個範例需要的事件處理常式已連線至事件。This example requires that the event handler has been connected to the event for a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 載入的檔案時方法，載入檔案的內容取代的整個內容控制項。When loading a file with the method, the contents of the file being loaded replace the entire contents of the control. 這會導致值和屬性來變更。This will cause the values of the and properties to change. 您可以使用這個方法將先前建立的文字或 RTF 文件載入操作的控制項。You can use this method to load a previously created text or RTF document into the control for manipulation. 如果您想要儲存檔案，您可以使用方法。If you want to save the file, you can use the method. > [!NOTE] > 與此版本方法，如果所載入的檔案不是 RTF 文件中，會發生例外狀況。With this version of the method, if the file being loaded is not an RTF document, an exception will occur. 若要載入不同類型的檔案，例如 ASCII 文字檔案，請使用 接受的值，這個方法的其他版本列舉型別做為參數。To load a different type of file such as an ASCII text file, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. > [!NOTE] > 方法不會開啟檔案，直到針對建立控制代碼。The method will not open a file until a handle is created for the . 請確定已建立的控制項控點，再呼叫方法。Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟至 RTF 檔控制項。The following code example opens an RTF file into the control. 此範例會使用類別，以顯示對話方塊，以向使用者要求的檔案。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the file from the user. 接著，程式碼檔案，假設是 RTF 的載入文件檔案。The code then loads that file assuming that it is an RTF document file. 如果檔案不是，範例程式碼將會擲回例外狀況。If the file is not, the example code will throw an exception. 這個範例需要的程式碼放在類別具有控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法以載入資料從現有的資料流的資料。You can use this version of the method to load the with data from an existing stream of data. 資料載入至控制項的整個內容取代控制項。The data that is loaded into the control replaces the entire contents of the control. 這會導致值和屬性來變更。This will cause the values of the and properties to change. 您可以使用這個方法將已開啟的檔案載入資料流操作的控制項。You can use this method to load a file that has been previously opened into a data stream into the control for manipulation. 如果您想要將控制項的內容儲存回資料流，您可以使用方法可接受物件做為參數。If you want to save contents of the control back into the stream, you can use the method that accepts a object as a parameter. 這個版本的方法也可讓您指定的正被載入控制項的資料類型。This version of the method also enables you to specify the type of data that is being loaded into the control. 這項功能可讓您使用 rtf 格式 (RTF) 的文件以外的資料包含在控制項的資料流。This feature enables you to use data streams that contain data other than rich text format (RTF) documents into the control. > [!NOTE] > 方法不會開啟檔案，直到針對建立控制代碼。The method will not open a file until a handle is created for the . 請確定已建立的控制項控點，再呼叫方法。Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和資料流的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它也示範如何使用， ， ，和成員。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 這是完整的範例，準備好要執行時將它複製到您的專案。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為 0 時，您可以輸入控制項中文字的最大長度為 64 KB 的字元。When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is 64 KB of characters. 這個屬性通常是使用當用來顯示單行文字 rtf 文字格式 (RTF)。This property is typically used when the is used to display a single line of rich text format (RTF) text. 您可以使用這個屬性，或限制的輸入資料時資料庫中輸入的文字長度來限制在控制項中輸入的值，例如郵遞區號和電話號碼、 文字的長度。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 您可以限制的最大長度，在資料庫中對應欄位的輸入控制項的文字。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼中，您可以設定的值屬性值的長度大於所指定的值，這個值以屬性。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 這個屬性只會影響執行階段輸入控制項的文字。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷如果被指派文字給控制項指派給的值大於屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if text being assigned to a control is larger than the value assigned to the property. 如果文字不是較大，此範例會使用屬性指派給控制項的文字。If the text is not larger, the example uses the property to assign the text to the control. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已新增至表單，搭配文字貼到控制項的參數來提供此範例中的方法呼叫的。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to a form and that the method in the example is called with text supplied to the parameter that is to be pasted into the control. 這個範例也需要限制文字項目插入屬性設定為值。The example also requires that the property has been set to a value to limit text entry into the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將資料從剪貼簿貼到控制項，您可以使用這個方法。You can use this method to paste data from the clipboard into the control. 這個版本的方法是從不同方法，因為它可讓您將只會將文字貼上指定的剪貼簿格式。This version of the method is different from the method as it enables you to paste only text in a specified Clipboard format. 您可以使用方法，以判斷剪貼簿內的資料是否為指定的剪貼簿格式。You can use the method to determine whether the data within the Clipboard is in the specified Clipboard format. 接著，您可以呼叫這一版的方法，以確保使用適當的資料格式，進行貼上作業。You can then call this version of the method to ensure that the paste operation is made with the appropriate data format. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以貼上至點陣圖控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 在開啟之後點陣圖檔案，此範例會使用的點陣圖複製到 Windows 剪貼簿的方法。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最後，此範例將擷取的格式物件、 驗證格式，可以貼到控制項，並使用貼上資料的方法。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, verifies that the format can be pasted into the control, and uses the method to paste the data. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Protected As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者嘗試修改控制項中保護的文字時。

span.span: Occurs when the user attempts to modify protected text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立此事件的事件處理常式，在您的應用程式，以判斷當使用者嘗試修改已標示為受保護控制項中的文字。You can create an event handler for this event in your applications to determine when the user has attempted to modify text that has been marked as protected in the control. 可以用事件處理常式，以通知受保護的文字使用者正嘗試修改的使用者或顯示對話方塊，讓使用者可以進行適當的變更的文字。The event handler can be used to notify the user that the text the user is attempting to modify is protected or to display a dialog box that enables the user to make appropriate changes to the text. 例如，如果受保護的區域是日期，您可以顯示對話方塊，讓使用者選擇日期，並接著可套用至控制項的文字。For example, if the protected area is a date, you can display a dialog box that enables the user to choose a date which can then be applied to the text of the control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 大於零的值輸入控制項，看不見的邊界會從控制項左側的像素數目指定控制項中。When a value greater than zero is entered into the control, a nonvisible margin is placed in the control at the specified number of pixels from the left side of the control. 超過這個邊界輸入任何文字會放在控制項中文字的下一行。Any text that is entered that extends beyond this margin is placed on the next line of text in the control. 這個屬性會影響目前輸入控制項，以及任何其他文字輸入控制項，此屬性設定之後的所有文字。This property affects all text currently entered into the control as well as any additional text entered into the control after the property is set. 您可以使用這個屬性來指定所有文字方塊中輸入文字的最大線條寬度控制項。You can use this property to specify a maximum line width for all text entered into a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立放大文字，會自動選取文字中控制項的文字時文字行首，且控制項的用戶端區域右邊界。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控制項具有較小的寬度，使用下列程式碼會建立所在的那一行顯示每個文字字元。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在 此垂直顯示的位置，文字的任何部分按一下將選取的文字會以垂直方式顯示的事實不論 word 的所有字元。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 這個範例需要您有包含表單的控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示或擷取控制項的文字與的指定 RTF 格式控制項的文字中所定義，您可以使用這個屬性，以將 RTF 格式化文字在控制項。You can use this property to place RTF formatted text into the control for display or to extract the text of the control with the specified RTF formatting defined in the text of the control. 這個屬性通常是當您要從另一個 RTF 來源，例如 Microsoft Word 或 Windows WordPad 指派 RTF 文字控制項時。This property is typically used when you are assigning RTF text from another RTF source, such as Microsoft Word or Windows WordPad, to the control. 如果您變更會保留在執行階段，但不含格式只未經處理的文字屬性。If you change the property at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. RTF 代碼，請參閱"rich text format (RTF) 規格，1.6 版"在 MSDN library 中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For the RTF codes, see "rich text format (RTF) Specification, version 1.6" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您將控制項的整個內容儲存至可供其他程式，例如 Microsoft Word 及 Windows WordPad RTF 檔案。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果檔案名稱傳遞給`path`參數已經存在於指定的目錄中，將會覆寫該檔案，恕不另行通知。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 您可以使用方法以載入的檔案內容。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . > [!NOTE] > 若要將控制項的內容儲存至不同類型的檔案格式，例如 ASCII 文字，使用 接受的值，這個方法的其他版本列舉型別做為參數。To save the contents of the control to a different type of file format such as ASCII text, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將儲存的內容RTF 檔的控制。The following code example saves the contents of a control to an RTF file. 此範例會使用類別，以顯示對話方塊，以儲存要求來自使用者、 路徑和檔案的檔案名稱。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request from the user, the path and filename of the file to save. 程式碼，然後儲存假設在 rich text 格式內容的檔案。The code then saves the file assuming the content is in rich text format. 如果檔案已經存在，則會自動覆寫。If the file already exists, it is automatically overwritten. 這個範例需要的程式碼放在類別具有控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您將控制項的整個內容儲存至可供其他程式，例如 Microsoft Word 及 Windows WordPad RTF 檔案。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果檔案名稱傳遞給`path`參數已經存在於指定的目錄中，將會覆寫該檔案，恕不另行通知。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 您可以使用方法以載入的檔案內容。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . 這個版本的方法可讓您指定要將控制項的內容儲存的檔案類型。This version of the method enables you to specify a file type to save the contents of the control to. 您可以使用這項功能，以確保檔案會儲存在適當的格式，依據控制項的內容。You can use this feature to ensure that the file is saved in the proper format based on the contents of the control. 比方說，如果您的文件不有任何差異字型樣式或著色，您可以儲存檔案為 ASCII 文字檔案設定`fileType`參數`RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`。For example, if your document has no differences in font style or coloring, you can save the file as an ASCII text file by setting the `fileType` parameter to `RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將儲存的內容成一個 ASCII 文字檔。The following code example saves the contents of the into an ASCII text file. 此範例會使用類別，以顯示對話方塊，以向使用者要求的路徑和檔案名稱。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the path and file name from the user. 然後，程式碼會將控制項的內容儲存至該檔案。The code then saves the contents of the control to that file. 此範例會使用這個版本的方法，以指定的檔案會儲存為 ASCII 文字檔案，而不是標準的 rich text 格式。The example uses this version of the method to specify that the file be saved as an ASCII text file instead of the standard rich text format. 這個範例需要的程式碼放在類別具有控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有選取的段落控制項中，設定這個屬性適用於對齊設定在其中插入點還會顯示有對齊屬性設定的段落之後建立的段落。If no paragraph is selected in the control, setting this property applies the alignment setting to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears as well as to paragraphs created after the paragraph that has the alignment property setting. 例如，如果有兩個段落中的控制項和插入點位於第二個段落內。For example, if there are two paragraphs in a control and the insertion point is located within the second paragraph. 如果您設定屬性`HorizontalAlignment.Center`，控制項中置中的插入點的段落。If you set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`, the paragraph at the insertion point will be centered within the control. 如果第二個段落後建立的第三個段落時，它也會對齊控制項的中央。If a third paragraph is created after the second paragraph, it also is aligned to the center of the control. 如果控制項內已建立的選取範圍，當屬性設定，所有選取的段落對齊根據此屬性設定。If a selection is made within the control when the property is set, all paragraphs selected are aligned based on this property setting. 您可以使用這個屬性所建立的文件中的段落的對齊。You can use this property to align the paragraphs in a document being created in the . 例如，如果您想要置中的文件中的所有段落時，您可以選取控制項中的所有段落和設定屬性`HorizontalAlignment.Center`。For example, if you want all paragraphs in a document to be centered, you can select all the paragraphs in the control and set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`. > [!NOTE] > 傳回`SelectionAlignment.Left`當文字選取範圍包含混合的對齊多個段落。 returns `SelectionAlignment.Left` when the text selection contains multiple paragraphs with mixed alignment. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何對齊文字方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to align text within the . 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已加入至表單。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未不選取任何文字，則項目符號樣式會套用至目前的插入點和所有使用者輸入之後插入點的段落。If no text is selected, the bullet style is applied to the current insertion point and to all paragraphs that the user enters after the insertion point. 項目符號樣式會套用至控制項的文字插入點移為止，或當使用者按下 Enter 鍵空白的項目符號項目上。The bullet style is applied to the text of the control until the insertion point is moved or when the user presses the Enter key on an empty bullet item. 如果控制項內選取的文字，當設定這個屬性時，所有選取的文字段落會轉換成項目符號清單中的項目符號項目。If text is selected within the control when this property is set, all paragraphs within the selected text are converted into bulleted items in the bulleted list. 您可以使用這個屬性來建立您在中建立的文件內的項目符號清單控制項。You can use this property to create bulleted lists within the documents you create in the control. 屬性可讓您指定要套用項目符號與項目符號項目文字的縮排數量。The property enables you to specify the amount of indentation to apply between the bullet and the bulleted item's text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性， ，和屬性，以建立分項清單中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`表單上建立。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. summary.span: 發生於控制項中文字的選取範圍變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the selection of text within the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立此事件，以判斷當使用者變更控制項中的文字選取範圍的事件處理常式。You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the user has changed text selection within the control. 此事件的事件處理常式可以用來保留使用者已完成應用程式中的工作，才選取的文字。An event handler for this event can be used to keep text selected until the user has completed a task within the application. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#544](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#544)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#544](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#544)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionCharOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項中的文字是否出現於基礎上做為上標，或者出現於基礎下方做為下標。

span.span: Gets or sets whether text in the control appears on the baseline, as a superscript, or as a subscript below the baseline.

value.span: 指定字元位移 (Offset) 的數字。

span.span: A number that specifies the character offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值必須是介於-2000年到 2000年之間。The value of this property must be between -2000 and 2000. 如果這個屬性設定為零，基準上會顯示文字。If this property is set to zero, the text appears on the baseline. 如果是正數，數字會指定所要依據選取的文字，高於基準的像素數目。If it is a positive number, the number specifies the number of pixels by which to raise the text selection above the baseline. 如果是負數，此數字指定像素的數目所依據的下標的文字選取範圍。If it is a negative number, this number specifies the number of pixels by which to subscript the text selection. 您可以使用這個屬性來指定上標和下標的文字。You can use this property to specify text as superscript or subscript. 如果未不選取任何文字，則位移會套用至目前的插入點和使用者類型在插入點後的所有文字。If no text is selected, the offset is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that the user types after the insertion point. 直到屬性變更為不同的值或插入點移至控制項中的其他部分之前，適用於字元位移。The character offset applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果控制項內選取的文字，將選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍將會套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性來建立此類應用程式為算術運算式上標和下標的文字。You can use this property to create superscript and subscript text for such applications as mathematical expressions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定上標和下標的文字內使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify superscript and subscript text within the using the property. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已加入至表單。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值小於 -2000 或大於 2000。

span.span: The specified value was less than -2000 or greater than 2000.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color SelectionColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前文字選取範圍或插入點的文字色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the text color of the current text selection or insertion point.

value.span: ，表示套用於目前文字選取範圍或輸入於插入點後文字的色彩。

span.span: A that represents the color to apply to the current text selection or to text entered after the insertion point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前文字選取範圍有多個指定的色彩，則這個屬性會傳回`Color.Empty`。If the current text selection has more than one color specified, this property returns `Color.Empty`. 如果目前不選取任何文字，這個屬性中指定的文字色彩會套用至目前的插入點，並輸入控制項的插入點之後的所有文字。If no text is currently selected, the text color specified in this property is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 文字色彩的設定會套用直到屬性變更為不同的色彩，或插入點移至控制項中的不同區段為止。The text color setting applies until the property is changed to a different color or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果控制項內選取的文字，將選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍將會套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性，若要變更文字色彩。You can use this property to change the color of text in the . 要在控制項中粗體文字，請使用指派新字型有指定的粗體字樣式屬性。To make text bold in the control, use the property to assign a new font that has the bold font style specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示給使用者，以便指定目前文字選取範圍或目前的插入後輸入文字的色彩點控制項。The following code example displays a to the user to specify a color for the current text selection or text entered after the current insertion point in a control. 這個範例需要在範例中定義的方法加入至類別，其中包含控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the method defined in the example is added to a class that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. summary.span: 取得或設定目前文字選取範圍或插入點的字型。

span.span: Gets or sets the font of the current text selection or insertion point.

value.span: ，表示套用於目前文字選取範圍或輸入於插入點之後的文字的字型。

span.span: A that represents the font to apply to the current text selection or to text entered after the insertion point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前文字選取範圍有多個指定的字型，這個屬性是`null`。If the current text selection has more than one font specified, this property is `null`. 如果目前不選取任何文字，這個屬性中指定的字型會套用至目前的插入點，並輸入控制項的插入點之後的所有文字。If no text is currently selected, the font specified in this property is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 字型設定會套用直到屬性變更為不同的字型，或插入點移至控制項中的不同區段為止。The font setting applies until the property is changed to a different font or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果控制項內選取的文字，將選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍將會套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性，若要變更文字的字型樣式。You can use this property to change the font style of text in the . 您可以使文字控制項中的粗體、 斜體和底線。You can make the text in the control bold, italic, and underlined. 您也可以變更文字及套用至文字的字型的大小。You can also change the size of the text and the font applied to the text. 若要變更控制項中文字的色彩，請使用屬性。To change the color of the text in the control, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會變更文字選取範圍或輸入之後的插入點內的文字設定的目前字型粗體樣式控制項。The following code example changes the current font bold style setting for the text selection or text entered after the insertion point within the control. 這個範例需要在方法內包含的程式碼。This example requires that the code is contained within a method in a . 這個範例也需要具名`richTextBox1`，已新增至。The example also requires that a , named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the . [!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.SelectionFont Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SelectionFont Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.SelectionFont Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SelectionFont Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.SelectionFont Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SelectionFont Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定選取段落中第一行文字的左邊緣和同段落中其他各行左邊緣間的距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the left edge of the first line of text in the selected paragraph and the left edge of subsequent lines in the same paragraph.

value.span: 套用於目前文字選取範圍或插入點的首行縮排距離 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The distance, in pixels, for the hanging indent applied to the current text selection or the insertion point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前不選取任何文字，首行縮排會套用的插入點所在的段落，並輸入控制項的插入點之後的所有文字。If no text is currently selected, the hanging indent is applied to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 首行縮排設定會套用直到屬性變更為不同的值或插入點移至其他控制項內段落為止。The hanging indent setting applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different paragraph within the control. 如果控制項內選取的文字，將選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍將會套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性套用至段落首行縮排。You can use this property to apply a hanging indent to your paragraphs. 若要設定的段落之選取範圍的第一行縮排，使用屬性。To set the indention of the first line of a paragraph selection, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定首行縮排內使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify hanging indents within the using the property. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已加入至表單。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. value.span: 套用於目前文字選取範圍或插入點後的縮排的目前距離 (以像素為單位)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前不選取任何文字，縮排設定會套用的插入點所在的段落，並輸入控制項的插入點之後的所有文字。If no text is currently selected, the indentation setting is applied to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 縮排設定會套用直到屬性變更為不同的值或插入點移至其他控制項內段落為止。The indentation setting applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different paragraph within the control. 如果控制項內選取的文字，將選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍將會套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用這個屬性來縮排段落中的文件包含。You can use this property to indent paragraphs contained in document of the . 您可以使用這個屬性搭配建立顯示在段落的段落。You can use this property in conjunction with the to create paragraphs displayed in paragraphs. 若要建立之段落首行縮排在控制項中，使用屬性。To create a hanging indent for paragraphs in the control, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定縮排的文字內使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify indented text within the using the property. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已加入至表單。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in control.

value.span: 如果目前選取範圍的內容不可變更，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前不選取任何文字，插入點所在的段落，並在插入點後輸入控制項的所有文字，會套用的保護設定。If no text is currently selected, the protection setting is applied to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 保護設定會套用直到屬性變更為不同的值或插入點移至其他控制項內段落為止。The protection setting applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different paragraph within the control. 如果控制項內選取的文字，將選取的文字和任何文字後，輸入文字選取範圍將會套用這個屬性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 若要防止使用者修改控制項中的文字區段，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to prevent the user from modifying sections of text within the control. 如果這個屬性設定為`true`、使用者嘗試變更目前文字選取範圍時，就會引發事件。If this property is set to `true`, the event is raised when the user attempts to change the current text selection. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會傳回`true`只有當整個選取範圍，在控制項中的包含受保護的內容。This property will return `true` only if the entire selection within the control contains protected content. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定受保護的文字內使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify protected text within the using the property. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`richTextBox1`，已新增至表單，而且控制項的文字新增至其中會包含單字"RichTextBox。 」This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form and that the control has text added to it that contains the word "RichTextBox." summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中的絕對定位停駐點 (Tab Stop) 位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the absolute tab stop positions in a control.

value.span: 陣列，其中的每個成員指定定位點位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: An array in which each member specifies a tab offset, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓您取得陣列，其中包含目前文字選取範圍內的每個索引標籤的間距控制項。This property enables you to obtain an array that contains the spacing for each tab in the current text selection within the control. 您接著可以使用這個屬性，來調整大小，每個索引標籤的文字選取範圍內。You can then use this property to adjust the size of each tab within the text selection. 例如，如果您想要調整 索引標籤內的空間文件，您可以選取整份文件，並取得的索引標籤使用的空間清單屬性。For example, if you want to adjust the tab space within the document, you can select the entire document and obtain the list of tab spaces using the property. 您可以調整它們到新的值，並將它們重新指派給這個屬性。You can then adjust them to new values and reassign them to this property.

exception.span: 此陣列中的元素超過 32 個元素的上限。

span.span: The array has more than the maximum 32 elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷目前選取才能執行目前的選取範圍上的控制項內的工作時正確地處理選取項目在控制項中的資料類型。You can use this property to determine the type of data that is currently selected in the control in order to handle the selection properly when performing tasks within the control on the current selection. 屬性可以代表任何的組合值列舉，代表物件目前的選取範圍中的許多類型。The property can represent any combination of values from the enumeration representing the many types of objects in the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，讓使用者輕鬆地選取中的文字行。You can use this property to enable the user to easily select lines of text in the . 選取範圍邊界會加入至左下方。The selection margin is added to the left side of the . 此邊界，方便使用者選取控制項左邊開頭的文字。This margin makes it easier for the user to select text starting on the left side of the control. 使用者可以按一下來選取單行文字選取範圍邊界，或按兩下即可選取整個段落中包含某一行的。The user can click in the selection margin to select a single line of text or double-click to select the entire paragraph that the line double-clicked is contained within. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`true`，設定屬性`RichTextBoxScrollBars.Horizontal`， `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Vertical`，或`RichTextBoxScrollBars.Both`不會顯示捲軸。If the property is set to `true`, setting the property to `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Horizontal`, `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Vertical`, or `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Both` will not cause scroll bars to be displayed. 若要顯示捲軸時屬性設定為`true`，將屬性`RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedHorizontal`， `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedVertical`，或`RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedBoth`。In order to display scroll bars while the property is set to `true`, set the property to `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedHorizontal`, `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedVertical`, or `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedBoth`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要顯示多行文字中，將屬性`true`。To display multiple lines of text in a , set the property to `true`. 若要讀取或設定多行文字方塊的文字，請使用屬性。To read or set the text of a multiline text box, use the property. 屬性未傳回任何資訊的內容所套用的格式。The property does not return any information about the formatting applied to the contents of the . 若要取得 rtf 格式 (RTF) 代碼，請使用屬性。To get the rich text formatting (RTF) codes, use the property. 您可以在輸入的文字數量控制項只會受到可用的系統記憶體。The amount of text that can be entered in the control is limited only by available system memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: public: property float ZoomFactor { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的目前縮放層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level of the .

value.span: 縮放控制項內容的因數。

span.span: The factor by which the contents of the control is zoomed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值可以介於 1/64 (0.015625) 和 64.0 之間，不含。The value of this property can be between 1/64 (0.015625) and 64.0, not inclusive. 值為 1.0 表示不縮放，會套用至控制項。A value of 1.0 indicates that no zoom is applied to the control. 當文件包含 TrueType 字型縮放功能會以最佳方式執行。The zoom feature performs optimally when the document contains TrueType fonts. 不是 TrueType 字型使用的控制項，在文件中時屬性將會使用最接近的整數值。When a font that is not TrueType is used within the document of the control, the property will use the nearest whole number value. 您可以使用這個屬性，讓使用者的控制項來縮放文件太小，若要檢視或加寬的檢視，以啟用多個要在螢幕上檢視的文件的章節。You can use this property to enable the user of the control to zoom into sections of the documentation that are too small to view or to condense the view to enable more of the document to be viewed on screen. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立放大文字，會自動選取文字中控制項的文字時文字行首，且控制項的用戶端區域右邊界。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控制項具有較小的寬度，使用下列程式碼會建立所在的那一行顯示每個文字字元。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在 此垂直顯示的位置，文字的任何部分按一下將選取的文字會以垂直方式顯示的事實不論 word 的所有字元。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 這個範例需要您有包含表單的控制項，名為`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的縮放因數並不在允許的範圍內。

span.span: The specified zoom factor did not fall within the permissible range.
